description: Signals that an item has been successfully removed from an entity's equipment slot and placed into their inventory. This event confirms the state change is complete. Note: Payloads use IDs for decoupling.

entityId.description: The unique ID of the entity whose equipment changed.

itemId.description: The unique identifier of the item instance that was unequipped.

slotId.description: The identifier of the equipment slot the item was removed from.

itemInstanceId.description: The unique ID of the item instance that was unequipped. (Same as itemId, potentially redundant but matches JSDoc).
